title: Can we divert lightning back to the sky by using a mirror? - Quora

response.answer_text: No I guess not. As you see, lightning is not a laser OT just a beam of light. It electricity and heat. A lots of it. The heat produced by lightning is as equal to that of the surface of the sun. So if u try to deflect it with a mirror, the mirror will blast due to the heat itself. And you will also get zapped and die instantly. SO PLEASE DON'T TRY IT ITS DEADLY. YOU CAN DIE  .

Lightning is not simple beam of light. It is discharge of electricity through air . The Lightning column that we see is electric current of hundreds of amperes. Now, would you like to place a mirror in it’s path?
